items.q: Please try to work ____________________ (quickly) in the future.
Swiss cheese has a ____________________ (sharp) flavor than mozzarella.
The red peppers are just ____________________ (hot) the green ones. They're both too hot for me.
Cell phones are getting ____________________ (small) every day.
I am not ____________________ (young) I look. I will be 30 this year.
Compared to prices in Texas, the cost of living in California is much ____________________ (expensive).
The mountaineering club helps prepare the hikers for any unforeseen ____________________ before they begin a climb.
You can hear news from across the ____________________ every evening at 6:00 p.m. on my favorite radio station
Animals have different ways to protect themselves ____________________ predators.
Baking a cake is ____________________ easy if you just follow the instructions carefully.
Everyone thinks my best friend and I are sisters because we are ____________________ in appearance.
As soon as Fiona ____________________ foot on her mother's porch, she knew that something was wrong.
The simplicity of the hotel's guest rooms was in ____________________ contrast to the extravagance in the lobby.
My father loves water sports, rowing in ____________________.
Brian is good at coming up with ____________________ solutions to complicated problems.
The babysitter was responsible ____________________ making dinner for the children as well as putting them to bed.
After work yesterday, I needed to stop by the post office, return a book to the library, and ____ at the bank. a. making a deposit b. to make a deposit c. make a deposit
A well-trained dog is a lot easier to take care of than ____. a. an untrained one b. untrained dogs c. being untrained
Carl has found that neither taking aspirin nor ____ relaxation techniques helps his headaches go away. a. to practice b. practicing c. practiced
Tony likes taking the bus better than ____ to school. a. to walk b. walking c. he likes to walk
Lisa teaches a yoga class on Friday, Saturday, and ____ evenings. a. on Sunday b. Sundays c. Sunday
Both convenient location and ____ are characteristics of a fast food restaurant. a. speedy service b. to have speedy service c. having speedy service
The grades on Maya's report card are always higher than ____. a. Amy b. Amy's grades are not as high c. Amy's
My uncle can speak Portuguese, Spanish, and ____ fluently. a. French b. he can speak French c. speaks French
The cost of frozen vegetables is not as expensive as ____. a. to buy fresh vegetables b. those of fresh vegetables c. that of fresh vegetables
Nora will either buy a new car or ____ with the money she inherited. a. take a vacation b. she takes a vacation c. a vacation
People have a tendency to become forgetful whenever they are deprived of food and to sleep . a. have b. deprived c. to sleep
Rick just bought a hybrid car even though it's expensiver than a regular one. a. bought b. even though c. expensiver
The movie I watched last night was very similarly to the book that it was based on. a. watched b. similarly c. was
I've always thought that sending a handwritten note is best than writing an email. a. sending b. best c. writing
If you are hiring a housekeeper, find one with excellent references and has several years of experience. a. hiring b. find c. has
resemble
fulfill
distinguish
facilitate
ensure
address
indigenous
vital
wide
tame
My older brother always has more money than me. ______________________________
Being the most youngest in my family has a lot of advantages. ______________________________
Having a college degree is more important for me than it was for my grandmother. ______________________________
My mother's personality is not as dynamic my father's. ______________________________
It is less common to have large families in recent years. ______________________________
Rewrite the paragraph, correcting any errors. Add at least three connectors that focus on either similarities or differences.
The legal driving age in the U.S. is lower than most other countries. __________
Her earache was much worse today than it was yesterday. __________
This machine prints only in black while that one in a dozen colors. __________
The photographs from this camera are much better than that camera. __________
The food at the restaurant is not nearly as good as your. __________
The purpose of a comparison essay is to explain the most effective means to achieve a desired result. __________
An appropriate topic for a comparison essay would be the effect of social media on family relationships. __________
There are two basic ways to organize a comparison essay: the point-by-point method and the block method. __________
Using a Venn diagram is a good way to brainstorm supporting details when preparing to write a comparison essay. __________
Some common transitions and connectors in a comparison essay are similar to, however , and on the other hand . __________
Compare and/or contrast the influence of friends and the influence of family. Use comparative forms of adjectives and adverbs in your comparison essay.
